school_about: A milestone in the college’s history has been the approval of his application for becoming a university which led to the founding of the European University Cyprus in September 2007. European University Cyprus offers degree programs at graduate, post-graduate and doctoral levels. The graduates of Cyprus College can continue their studies at European University Cyprus to acquire graduate and post-graduate degrees.
school_location: Archbishop Makarios III 56, Limassol Cyprus Limassol CY 3065, Archbishop Makarios III 56, Paramytha 4540, Cyprus

program_name: Computer and Network Technician (2 year - Diploma)
description: The Computer Technician has high technical training in modern technology, in the fields of IT and electronics. Computer systems and electronic devices are now more sophisticated than ever before, and their repair and maintenance make the profession of Computer Technician highly sought after. The Computer Technician has practical knowledge and skills that make him ready to offer a variety of services such as setting up, shaping and supporting networks, computers and electromechanical equipment in general.

description: In the modern times with the rapid advances in business and technology, the secretary is one of the necessary executives of a business as it contributes to its proper operation. He is a trusted person for the executives with whom he works and is the executive of the business that has the potential to contribute substantially to the whole operation of the business. The sector offers excellent prospects of employing, developing and recognizing the role of the special secretary / assistant.
